An artistic workshop (mirror painting):
27  February,  2024
was organized as part of enhancing community partnership with all state institutions, in coordination with the Entrepreneurship Center for Girls' Activities. Eighteen members (from both groups) from the Best Buddies Club at Moza bint Mohammed Preparatory School for Girls participated in the workshop. During the workshop, the members were trained on the basics of glass painting skill.
